title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5002.6 - Discharge of State liability upon payment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5002.6 - Discharge of State liability upon payment

State Regulations

The State and the State's agents, officers, employees, and the commission and the commission's agents, officers and employees shall
all be discharged of any and all liability upon payment of a prize to a ticket
holder. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5002.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
